title: The positive effect of an educational intervention on successful spirometry in Greek preschool children.
abstract: This study investigated the feasibility of performing spirometry without technical errors in preschool children. It also evaluated the effect of an educational intervention on the success rates and duration of spirometry in this age group. This randomized controlled study was conducted in Greece during two separate time periods due to the COVID-19 pandemic.
